name: Christmas Blessing Chest
description: A loving Christmas Chest. Open it to receive a mysterious gift.

name: Christmas Chest
description: A loving Christmas Chest. Open it to receive a mysterious gift.

name: Christmas Chest
description: The package received by completing chest quest in Gingerbread City. Open it to find Snowman, Edelweiss and other materials, with a small probability to find normal Blueprint.

name: Christmas Costume Chest (Female)
description: Christmas Fashion Package launched by Kafra and Gingerbread City, with small gifts in it. (These fashion clothes are only for female)

name: Christmas Costume Chest (Male)
description: Christmas Fashion Package launched by Kafra and Gingerbread City, with small gifts in it. (These fashion clothes are only for male)

name: Christmas Crown Headwear series
description: After wearing this, you will be the happiest prince or princess in this period of the year!

name: Christmas Eggyra
description: Eggyra blessed by god. It gives you a warm Christmas night.

name: Christmas Garland
description: Wreath weaved from evergreen branches. Bell sound came from afar.

name: Christmas Headwear Crown·Brown
description: After wearing this, you will be the happiest prince or princess in this period of the year! The heartwarming Moca Brown is the nice color of the world!

name: Christmas Headwear Crown·Green
description: After wearing this, you will be the happiest prince or princess in this period of the year! The fashionate forest green is the most vivid color of the world!

name: Christmas Headwear Crown·Red
description: After wearing this, you will be the happiest prince or princess in this period of the year! The bright Christmas red is the most passionate color of the world!

name: Christmas Headwear Crown·White
description: After wearing this, you will be the happiest prince or princess in this period of the year! The elegant moonlight white is the purest color of the world!
